/shot.name: player's in-game name
/shot.aim-start-angle: angle of the shot at mouse down
/shot.aim-end-angle: angle of the shot at mouse up
/shot.aim-start-distance: distance of mouse from ball at mouse down
/shot.aim-end-distance: distance of mouse from ball at mouse up
/shot.aim-time: time taken to aim the shot

/hole.name: player's in-game name
/hole.shots: number of shots taken to complete the hole (DOES NOT INCLUDE WATER)
/hole.time: time taken to complete the hole
